Mailing Address: c/o Charities DirectorateCanada Revenue AgencyOttawa, ON     K1A 0L5
Service Details: - Registers qualifying organizations as charities, gives technical advice on operating a charity, handles audit and compliance activities, and provides donors with relevant information about donating to charities - Offers online lists of Canadian charities for viewing of their financial activities - Client service representatives are available for general information, confirmation on registered charity status, requests for public documents, operational guidance to existing charities, information on application process and application completion
